channel.title: Posts on Delong Yang's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Delong Yang's personal blog

item.title: How to Predict Test
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to know how to predict test.

outline

  • 1 data preprocessing
  • 2 creating prompts
  • 3 tokenization
  • 4 model initialization
  • 5 inference
  • 6 parallel inference
  • 7 result aggregation
  • 8 submission file generation

item.title: How to Run Gptq
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to know how to run gptq.

outline

  • 1 load the model
  • 2 transfer the model and tokenizer to gpu
  • 3 logging
  • 4 build dataset
  • 5 configure the gptq parameters
  • 6 configure the quantize parameters
  • 7 perform quantization
  • 8 save the result

  • 2 merge lora
  • 3 save the result

item.title: How to Fine Tune Knowledge Distillation
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to know how to fine tune knowledge distillation.

outline

  • 1 judge if the distributed environment has been deployed
  • 2 configure the training parameters for deep learning
  • 3 group the parameters of a model for optimization
  • 4 set for debugging and logging purposes
  • 5 transfer each value in the batch to the specified device
  • 6 set the random seed for various libraries and components
  • 7 create a dataset for a specific task
  • 8 perform the training process
  • 9 save the data
  • 10 parse command-line arguments * 11 ensures that the main function is executed directly when the script is run and not imported as a module for another script

item.title: How to Merge Logits
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to know how to merge the logits.

outline

  • 1 define a softmax function to obtain a probability distribution
  • 2 converts the output of a softmax function back to logits
  • 3 perform merging operations

item.title: How to Predict
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to know about the process of predicting.

outline

  • 1 accept the arguments of the python script from the command line
  • 2 load tokenizer
  • 3 load data
  • 4 define a custom dataset
  • 5 load model
  • 6 transfer the elements of a batch to a specified device
  • 7 initializes the necessary environment and data for multi-threaded inference
  • 8 split the test data for parallel inference
  • 9 perform paralell inference on the test data with multithreads
  • 10 save the results

item.title: How to Train
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to know about the process of training.

outline

  • 1 judge if the distributed environment has been deployed
  • 2 configure the training parameters for deep learning
  • 3 group the parameters of a model for optimization
  • 4 set for debugging and logging purposes
  • 5 transfer each value in the batch to the specified device
  • 6 set the random seed for various libraries and components
  • 7 complete implementation of the training process for a sequence classification model
  • 8 save a trained model and its tokenizer to a specified directory
  • 9 parse command-line arguments
  • 10 ensures that the main function is executed directly when the script is run and not imported as a module for another script

item.title: How to Process Data Before Training
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to know the base knowledge of how to process data before training. It will combine a real classification task of to explain the process.

outline

  • 1 accept the arguments of the python script from the command line
  • 2 load tokenizer
  • 3 load data
  • 4 convert the binary data to alphabetic data of labels
  • 5 remove excess symbols and concatenate data
  • 6 write data into dataframe
  • 7 split 5 fold data
  • 8 get the input prompt
  • 9 get the reverse data
  • 10 save the data

item.title: Words
item.description:
—————————————————–

truncate截断v. yield产出v. yield to让步于 slice切片n.

placeholder占位符n. iterate over迭代 breakdown分解n.

encode编码v. decode解码v. debug调试v. snippet代码段n.

ternary operator三元运算符n. be derived from…源于…

distinct截然不同的adj. be retained in…保留在…中

be flipped in…翻转在…中 concatenate连接v. reversal反转n.

2024.10.8

coordinate坐标n. offload卸载v. prefetching预取n. threshold阈值n.

precision精度n. nontrainable不可训练的adj. partition分区n.

clip裁剪v. pre-scaling预缩放n. hybrid混合的adj. facilitate促进v.

custom自定义的adj. retrieval检索n. collate核对v. format格式n.

be responsible for…对…负责 perform执行v. thread线程n.

subtract减去v. overflow溢出n. exponentiate取幂v. normalize归一化v.

implement实现v. aggregation聚合n.

2024.10.9

item.title: How to Use Bash in Deep Learning
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to use bash to train in deep learning. It introduce some common usage of bash.

top

outline

  • 1 how to run bash script
  • 2 how to run python script in bash script
  • 3 how to detect the error and stop immediately
  • 4 how to print parameters to debug when running bash script
  • 5 how to use deepspped to start training in bash script

1 how to run bash script

to run a bash script, you should add #!/bin/bash in the first line of the script.

‘#!/bin/bash’

item.title: How to Blog With Markdown
item.description:
This blog is suitabe for someone who want to blog with markdown.It introduces some common grammar of markdown which is applicable to blogging.If you are familiar with the website technology such as html,css and js, it is easy for you to understand the content of the blog.

top

outline

  • 1 how to write words
  • 2 how to add code blocks
  • 3 how to add links from outside
  • 4 how to do the title jump to the paragraph in the page
  • 5 how to go back to the top from the bottom of the page
  • 6 how to use escape character

1 how to write words

big title press

# big title

item.title: How To Blog On Github From Zero With Hugo And Github Pages
item.description:
This blog is suitable for someone who want to start a blog on github from zero to start with hugo and github pages. The blog contains two parts which are steps and some problems that you probably encounter. You can share some simple ideas about technology, life, etc on blog. If you have high demand for security and privacy, you can read other blogs to meet your needs.

outline

  • part 1 steps
    • step 1 create a new repository
    • step 2 install hugo and git
    • step 3 create a new site
    • step 4 add a theme
    • step 5 creat a new blog
    • step 6 preview site
    • step 7 creat a hugo site
    • step 8 convert the public folder to git library
    • step 9 associate a local library with a remote library
    • step 10 commit changes to the local library
    • step 11 push changes to the remote library
  • part 2 problems that you probably encounter
    • problem 1
    • problem 2
    • problem 3
    • problem 4
    • problem 5
  • reference

part 1 steps

step 1 create a new repository

1.If you don’t have a github account, you can sign in on Github.

2.Create a new repository named username.github.io. The username is your github account name.

step 2 install hugo and git

1.Install hugo on your computer. You can download the package from Hugo Releases. More details can be found on Hugo Docs.(For me, I use windows 11.I just need to download the package and then comfigure the environment variable.)

In terminal, use hugo version to make sure if the installation is successful.

hugo version

2.Install git on your computer. You can download the package from Git Download.

In terminal, use git version to make sure if the installation is successful.

git version

step 3 create a new site

1.enter your own folder.(The folder is to store your local repository.)

2.creat a new hugo site(You can use the name you like to replace DelongYang666-blog)

hugo new site DelongYang666-blog

step 4 add a theme

1.choose a theme from Hugo Themes

2.download the theme.Then you can see the “ananke” in the theme folder.

cd DelongYang666-blog

git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke

3.configure the theme in hugo.toml

cd DelongYang666-blog

add theme = ‘ananke’ to the hugo.toml in the end by hand.

step 5 creat a new blog

cd DelongYang666-blog

hugo new post/my-first-post.md

edit the post/my-first-post.md and save it.

step 6 preview site

cd DelongYang666-blog

hugo server -D

enter the url in the browser. The url is http://localhost:1313/. You can see your first blog.Press ctrl + c to exit the server.

step 7 creat a hugo site

cd DelongYang666-blog

hugo

This command is to save your files in the public folder but not delete the files you have added in the public folder. You can see some documents in the public folder.The public folder is the folder to store the site.

step 8 convert the public folder to git library

cd DelongYang666-blog/public

git init

step 9 associate a local library with a remote library

cd DelongYang666-blog/public

git remote add origin git@github.com:DelongYang666/DelongYang666.github.io.git

change DelongYang666/DelongYang666.github.io.git to your own name.

open public folder ->.git -> config document. You can see if the remote is associated with the local library.

	repositoryformatversion = 0
	filemode = false
	bare = false
	logallrefupdates = true
	symlinks = false
	ignorecase = true
[remote "origin"]
	url =git@github.com:DelongYang666/DelongYang666.github.io.git
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*

step 10 commit changes to the local library

cd DelongYang666-blog/public

git status#see current status

git add .#add all files you chaged

git commit -m "Add a new post"#commit changes

step 11 push changes to the remote library

cd DelongYang666-blog/public

git push -u origin master

part 2 problems that you probably encounter

problem 1

*** Please tell me who you are. Run git config –global user.email “you@example.com” git config –global user.name “Your Name”

git config --global user.email "you@example.com"

git config --global user.name "Your Name"

problem 2

git@github.com: Permission denied (publickey). fatal: Could not read from remote repository. Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists.

ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail@example.com"

chage the email to your own email.Press enter all the time.

enter C:\User\root.ssh.Open the id_rsa.pub document.Copy the content.

Open your github.Press setting -> SSH and GPG keys.Fill in the ‘Ttile’ blank with ‘key’.Fill in the ‘Key’ blank with the content you copied.

then add the ssh key.

problem 3

ssh: connect to host github.com port 22: Connection refused fatal: Could not read from remote repository. Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists.

cd C:\Users\username\.ssh

then you can see the config document.Open it and add the following content.

Host github.com
 Hostname ssh.github.com
 Port 443

problem 4

! [reject!] master -> master (fetch first)

error:failed to push some prefs to ‘xxxxxx’

first way(suit for the first push)

git push -f origin master

second way(suit for the daily push)

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories #Synchronize the remote repository with the local repository
git add .
git commit -m "commit messege"
git push -u origin master

problem 5

src refspec master does not match any error: failed to push some refs to

The default branch on the github is ‘main’,if you press ‘git push -u origin master’.It will be error.

first way

git push -u origin main

second way

open your github and enter your repository.press settings -> page ->source ->deploy from a branch.branch->master.remember to press save.

reference

如何利用 GitHub Pages 和 Hugo 轻松搭建个人博客？

If it helps you, please follow me and help me vote yes.

back to outline
